Set.Text: The choice of ideology becomes available when you build your third factory or enter the Modern Era, whichever comes first. After that, the ideological tenets will be unlocked when you researched the required technologies.

Row.Text: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]你需要先研究 [ENDCOLOR][COLOR_FONT_GREEN]{1_TechString:textkey}[ENDCOLOR][COLOR_WARNING_TEXT] 以解鎖分支。[ENDCOLOR]

Set.Text: 當您建造了第三座工廠或進入了現代（無論先後），便可選擇意識形態。 之後，當你研究出所需的科技，就能解鎖意識形態原則。
